name: copilotprompts-m365-ai-automation-opportunity-finder
title: AI Automation Opportunity Finder & ROI Calculator
shortDescription: Analyzes business processes to identify AI and automation opportunities, calculate potential ROI, and create implementation roadmaps for digital transformation initiatives.
longDescription: This prompt helps organizations identify where AI and automation can deliver the most value. It provides data-driven recommendations for digital transformation, helping prioritize initiatives that maximize ROI while minimizing implementation risks. The analysis includes process inventory, automation opportunity scoring, specific AI/automation solutions, comprehensive ROI analysis, implementation roadmaps, risk assessment, and change management planning.
